name: The Hype Mic
imagePrompt: A futuristic, sleek microphone with a glowing symbol, emitting sound waves that look like digital speech bubbles and music notes, held by an unseen hand.
abilityText: After your hero attacks, give a random friendly minion +1/+1. 'IS THIS THING ON? CAN YOU HEAR ME IN THE BACK?'
flavorText: Not for background noise. This bad boy cuts through algorithms and reminds everyone music was meant to be felt, not optimized.

weaponEffect.description: After your hero attacks, give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
